component.name: Addiction tracker
component.summary: Addiction Tracker - An app for tracking substance addiction and habits (made with Tauri)

description.p: Your journey to recovery starts here. Track your progress, identify triggers, and celebrate milestones on your path to a healthier life.

ul.li: ✔ Understand Your Triggers - Feeling blindsided by sudden urges? Identify patterns and triggers that lead to substance use, so you can prepare and respond effectively.
✔ See the Financial Impact - Shocked by how much money disappears? Track your spending on substances and visualize what you could save for things that truly matter.
✔ Remember Your Why - Struggling to stay motivated? Store personal motivations and access them instantly when cravings hit to strengthen your resolve.
